document.full_text: the price of oil is still almost 30 percent higher than a year ago. 'this is a correction, and not a shift in trend,' one analyst said of the recent fall in prices.
document.title: price of crude oil falls again, but analysts warn it will remain at lofty levels
lines_and_colors: the price of oil is still almost 30 percent higher than a year ago. 'this is a correction, and not a shift in trend,' one analyst said of the recent fall in prices.
